review.title: “Firm engages Senior level Management Consulting to slice firms recruiting and hiring issues.”
review.pros: Pros – Fun work that has a great impact.
review.cons: Cons – Some projects turn into longer term recruiting and hiring after better processes are in place. Rather solve the problems and show client personnel how to do long term implementations.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Expand now as many firms need your services. Hire or contract more people.
